headline: What Recent Analyst Shifts Mean For TAT Technologies (TATT) And Its Evolving Story
summary: The latest update to the TAT Technologies narrative hinges on a small but telling shift in fair value per share, moving from about US$49.00 to roughly US$49.67. The discount rate estimate stays essentially flat at around 9.47%, and modeled revenue growth steps slightly lower to about 16.15%. This tweak reflects bullish views around EBITDA margin support and recent mid teens growth, balanced against more cautious assumptions for the 131 APU opportunity and its timing. Stay with this article to...

headline: Faropoint Secures $600M Acquisition Credit Facility for Industrial Value Fund IV
summary: HOBOKEN, N.J., January 07, 2026--Faropoint secured a $600M credit facility for Fund IV from KeyBank, JP Morgan, Capital One, Truist, and Citizens to support portfolio growth.

headline: Why Analysts See Zeta Global Holdings (ZETA) Story Shifting After Marigold Deal And New Targets
summary: Zeta Global Holdings' fair value per share is unchanged at US$29.67, even as the discount rate edges slightly lower to 8.54% and the long term revenue growth assumption holds at about 20.62%. This reflects a market story in which the Marigold acquisition, updated FY26 guidance, and a heavier focus on organic growth targets are shaping how analysts frame potential upside. Continue with this article to see how you can keep track of these narrative shifts and stay updated as the story...
